comments.raw_text:
This came out of discussions today with Madhava etc on #fx-team and #mobile channels related to bug 681958.

It might be a user win to be able to allow a user to mimic a different browser for a certain site, or browser based web app.

This could be a win for people with cognitive impairments, or people with low vision who may require magnification. For example the ability to select a FF mobile Ux for twitter.com might result in a less noisy interface for uses of FF on desktop.
comments.author: dbolter@mozilla.com
